misc: Struggles with his gender identity, occasionally participating in events under his female alter-ego, "Eva".
biography: Marcus is a highly accomplished golfer, hailing from Kurk Golf, who has consistently demonstrated his exceptional skill at the prestigious Hector Trophée.  A testament to his dedication and talent, Marcus has participated in four consecutive tournaments, showcasing his prowess on the greens in 2022, 2023, 2024 and 2025.

While Marcus has yet to claim victory in the main Hector Trophée competition, his consistent participation demonstrates his commitment to the event and his ability to compete at the highest levels of the sport. He is a formidable player who always brings a strong and competitive presence to the tournament. His drive and focus are undeniable, and the Hector Trophée organizers and fans alike await with bated breath the possibility of his future successes.

Beyond his dedication to the Hector Trophée, Marcus has shown an impressive ability to adapt and overcome challenges.  He has shown remarkable resilience and strength of character, navigating personal complexities with grace and fortitude, and this is reflected in his approach to the game.

Noteworthy is his occasional participation in the competition using the name Eva. Regardless of the persona, the exceptional talent is undeniable.  This underscores his unique dedication and innovative spirit. We are excited to see what he accomplishes in the years to come.
